emailTemplate.name: friendship_request
emailTemplate.subject: $core_v2_configuration.SiteName - $email_utility.SiteTerm("friendship_propercase") request: $core_v2_friendship.Current.Requestor.DisplayName
emailTemplate.htmlBody:
#set($friendship = $core_v2_friendship.Current)

$friendship.Requestor.DisplayName would like to add you as a $email_utility.SiteTerm("friend_lowercase") on $core_v2_configuration.SiteName:

#if($friendship.RequestMessage)
$friendship.RequestMessage
#end

Accept or decline this request.

Learn more about $friendship.Requestor.DisplayName.
emailTemplate.textBody:
#set($friendship = $core_v2_friendship.Current)
$friendship.Requestor.DisplayName would like to add you as a $email_utility.SiteTerm("friend_lowercase") on $core_v2_configuration.SiteName: #if($friendship.RequestMessage) $email_utility.RenderText($friendship.RequestMessage) #end Accept ($core_v2_urls.AcceptFriendship($friendship.Recipient.Username, $friendship.Requestor.Username)) or decline ($core_v2_urls.RejectFriendship($friendship.Recipient.Username, $friendship.Requestor.Username)) this request. Learn more about $friendship.Requestor.DisplayName: $core_v2_urls.User($friendship.Requestor.Id)
